JOM.class.coffee

Classes

  • JOM

Json Object Model

required: Schema Tree && Machine Data && ~Human Data (~ optional) @tree is schema, describes how data should be structured (hierarchically) @human are data to display to user, e.g: a list of data from a drop down. animal = ['dog','cat','horse','mouse'] @machine are data, which machine can manipulate this usually indicates the current state of type of pets of a user animal = ['cat']

the above would yield a dropdown: (jade style, convert to html if you wish) Jade Lang: convert to HTML using: http://html2jade.org/

select
  option(value="dog")
  option(value="cat" selected="selected")
  option(value="horse")
  option(value="mouse")
